entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
